text: The 1974 LPGA Championship was the 20th LPGA Championship, held June 20–23 at Pleasant Valley Country Club in Sutton, Massachusetts, southeast of Worcester. Sandra Haynie, the 1965 champion, won her second LPGA Championship, two strokes ahead of JoAnne Carner.
